about_the_game:
The most ordinary person has the most ordinary life, work, wife, an outstanding loan for a mortgage, and superiors who do not want to raise his salary, but then came the very long-awaited day when everyone is given an increase for long work, but our protagonist of this story instead of raising or at least the bonuses for the work, they simply fired, hiring a man with connections in his place, and here our hero comes home, where his wife left leaving a note that she doesn’t need an unemployed sucker, our hero inherits the day in complete sadness and depression, goes to the office, so that take your things and while he collects veshit he goes scrip and decides to take revenge for the dismissal of the company, now the authorities strongly regret that fired him.


PSIHANUL- you will take revenge on the bosses and colleagues for the fact that you were fired, shoot and break everything around you, do not leave anything behind you, destroy this office and no one will help you in this, so good luck and don't freak out.

You work in an office, but one day you lost your temper and started beating up your office colleagues. Colleagues, guards, special forces, military forces are sent to you to pacify you. Your goal is to survive as long as possible by gaining psycho points and upgrading your current weapon from the keyboard to a minigun. Congratulations, now you're crazy!

highlighted.name: Guns? Is it guns ?! HERE A GUN!
The guy found a machine gun in the office, no one else lives in the office

content_descriptors.notes: The whole point of the game is in violence against surrounding people and objects, it will be from the beginning to the end of the game, available from the first seconds of gameplay. The game is more described as cruel but moderate.

detailed_description:
Special Offer


About the Game

The most ordinary person has the most ordinary life, work, wife, an outstanding loan for a mortgage, and superiors who do not want to raise his salary, but then came the very long-awaited day when everyone is given an increase for long work, but our protagonist of this story instead of raising or at least the bonuses for the work, they simply fired, hiring a man with connections in his place, and here our hero comes home, where his wife left leaving a note that she doesn’t need an unemployed sucker, our hero inherits the day in complete sadness and depression, goes to the office, so that take your things and while he collects veshit he goes scrip and decides to take revenge for the dismissal of the company, now the authorities strongly regret that fired him.


PSIHANUL- you will take revenge on the bosses and colleagues for the fact that you were fired, shoot and break everything around you, do not leave anything behind you, destroy this office and no one will help you in this, so good luck and don't freak out.

You work in an office, but one day you lost your temper and started beating up your office colleagues. Colleagues, guards, special forces, military forces are sent to you to pacify you. Your goal is to survive as long as possible by gaining psycho points and upgrading your current weapon from the keyboard to a minigun. Congratulations, now you're crazy!
name: Psihanul

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580 - 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
